basics.description: **Note:** _There may be [known issues](https://aka.ms/sentinelsolutionsknownissues) pertaining to this Solution, please refer to them before installing._ The [Cisco SD-WAN](https://www.cisco.com/c/en_in/solutions/enterprise-networks/sd-wan/index.html) solution for Microsoft Sentinel enables you to ingest Syslog and Netflow logs into Microsoft Sentinel, providing insight into network threats and vulnerabilities. **Underlying Microsoft Technologies used:** This solution takes a dependency on the following technologies, and some of these dependencies either may be in [Preview](https://azure.microsoft.com/support/legal/preview-supplemental-terms/) state or might result in additional ingestion or operational costs: a. [Agent-based log collection (Syslog) ](https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/sentinel/forward-syslog-monitor-agent) **Data Connectors:** 1, **Parsers:** 4, **Workbooks:** 1, **Analytic Rules:** 4, **Playbooks:** 3 [Learn more about Microsoft Sentinel](https://aka.ms/azuresentinel) | [Learn more about Solutions](https://aka.ms/azuresentinelsolutionsdoc)

options.text: This Solution installs the data connector for Cisco SD-WAN. You can get Cisco SD-WAN Syslog data in your Microsoft Sentinel workspace. After installing the solution, configure and enable this data connector by following guidance in Manage solution view.

The Solution installs a parser that transforms the ingested data into Microsoft Sentinel normalized format. The normalized format enables better correlation of different types of data from different data sources to drive end-to-end outcomes seamlessly in security monitoring, hunting, incident investigation and response scenarios in Microsoft Sentinel.

link.label: Learn more about connecting data sources

options.text: This solution installs workbook(s) to help you gain insights into the telemetry collected in Microsoft Sentinel. After installing the solution, start using the workbook in Manage solution view.
This solution installs the following analytic rule templates. After installing the solution, create and enable analytic rules in Manage solution view.
This Analytic rule will monitor Intrusion events in Cisco syslog data based on the provided Signature ID. This will create an incident if that Signature ID is found in the specified time range.
This analytic rule will monitor specific IPS event in the data.
This analytic rule will monitor Malware Events in Syslog and Netflow Data
This analytic rule will monitor critical IPs in Syslog and Netflow Data.

This solution installs the Playbook templates to help implement your Security Orchestration, Automation and Response (SOAR) operations. After installing the solution, these will be deployed under Playbook Templates in the Automation blade in Microsoft Sentinel. They can be configured and managed from the Manage solution view in Content Hub.
